sentences.sContent: If she gets the nod, Kagan says she will consider every case impartially and with commitment to principle.
sentences.sContent_eng: If she gets the nod, Kagan says she will consider every case impartially and with commitment to principle.
sentences.sCn: Kagan 说如果她能通过，她将公平地处理每个案子并忠于原则办事。

sentences.sContent: In order for the independent director to exercise his rights impartially and equitably, nothing can go without a constraint mechanism in addition to above-mentioned incentive mechanism.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order for the independent director to exercise his rights impartially and equitably, nothing can go without a constraint mechanism in addition to above-mentioned incentive mechanism.
sentences.sCn: 为了让独立董事更公正与公平地履行他的职责, 除了上述的激励机制外, 一个有效的约束机制也是必不可少的.

words.tran: 公平的，公正的；不偏不倚的
